input: DOCTOR: What brings you in today?\nPATIENT: I guess I’ve been feeling kind of more tired than usual and sometimes I get these weird dizzy spells. My mom says I’m not acting like myself, and I don’t know, I’ve just been worried because I feel strange a lot.
output:
THINKING: The patient reports increased fatigue and episodes of dizziness, as well as feeling "strange" and not acting like oneself. These symptoms are newly mentioned and will be added to the existing vignette.  
ANSWER: The patient reports feeling more tired than usual and experiencing occasional dizzy spells. They also mention feeling "strange" and not acting like themselves. Previously, no symptoms were documented.

input:
DOCTOR: What brings you in today?
PATIENT: I guess I’ve been feeling kind of more tired than usual and sometimes I get these weird dizzy spells. My mom says I’m not acting like myself, and I don’t know, I’ve just been worried because I feel strange a lot.
DOCTOR: Can you tell me more about when these symptoms started, how they have been affecting your daily activities, and if you've noticed anything that makes them better or worse?
PATIENT: Um, I guess the problems started a while ago, maybe when I was really little, and lately, I just feel kinda tired or different most of the time. Sometimes I have trouble doing things like running or concentrating, and I don't really know what makes it better or worse — it just feels the same most of the time.
output:
THINKING: The current conversation introduces new details about the symptoms beginning in early childhood, a ongoing feeling of tiredness and feeling different most of the time, and difficulty with activities like running or concentrating. These details expand on the duration and nature of the symptoms, which were not previously documented.  
ANSWER: The patient reports feeling more tired than usual and experiencing occasional dizzy spells. They mention feeling "strange" and not acting like themselves. The problems started when the patient was really little and have persisted; recently, the patient feels tired or different most of the time and has difficulty with activities like running or concentrating.
